lore: Calumniers have long fought humans and often found themselves outnumbered, losing many villages in the process.\n\nWhen it comes to close combat, no one beats the Calumnier Belles. They don't need weaponsâ€”their sharp claws can pierce even the toughest armor with enough training. In the city of Eshal, a famous dojo has stood for 40 years, drawing fighters from all races who want to master their deadly art.
menagerieDialog: (It's basking lazily in a patch of sunlight, eyes half-closed.)
Your enemies will rue the day they crossed paths with us!
Let's discuss battle strategies. I have a few ideas that might surprise you.
My scales are like armor, forged in the fires of battle!
(It's pacing back and forth, its tail swishing impatiently.)
name: Calumnier Belle
